unnormalised: Bore, konnain tori India ani Pakistan cricket match-ache stats vixim vicharlem, hã? Mhaka zann asa tem porim, ODIs-ant, India-k Pakistan-achea 55 jeet-am tulnent lagbag 80 jeet-am asun ekdom bori lead asa. Ani zodd tum World Cup match-anchek pollyet zalear, India-cho record 7-0 vo kitem-i axem kitlo tori crazy asa. Proper domination, yaar! Punn mhaka dista, kiteim zanv yeta tea disa, te kortat tem porim.
normalised: Borem, konnem tori Bharat ani Pakistan cricket match-chea statistics-anche vixim vicharlem, hã? Borem, nimnnem mhaka gom'ta ten'na, O-D-I-n, Bharatak chodd borem fuddariponn asa, sumar att'tor zīt-tim Pakistanachea sumar pannaas ponchpan-anche tulnen. Ani tumi World Cup match-anche vixim pollelear, Bharatacho record sumar sat shunya vo kiteim asat bhonvtem. Khoreponnan domination, yaar! Punn, tumi zannat tech promannem, kiteim zaleaari ti-divos ghevn yena.

unnormalised: T20s thorodem lagginch asat, mhaka dista. Pakistan-ak thorodi edge asli asteli, lagbag 20-odd match-am khellunk lagbag 9 vo 10 jeet-am mellovn? Punn mukhel vost mhunnttlear, India sadharanponnan vhodd tournament-am-nt zori jeeta. Asia Cups ani World Cups - tantun mahatv asta. Virat Kohli-chi T20 WC-antlea pattlea vorsachi innings ugddas asa tumkam? 160 chase kelem. Magical!
normalised: T twenty s thorim thoddem laggi asta bhonvtem, mhaka dista. Pakistanak sumar nine vo ten zīt-tim sumar vis odh match-am bhitor mellttalim bhonvtem? Punn mahatvachem hem asa ki Bharat mukhel tournament-amni uttam korta. Asia Cups ani World Cups – titlench mahatvachem. Tumka Virat Kohli innings yaad asa T twenty W C nimnnea vorsa thavn? Ek shāt soxtt chukta kel'lem. Magical!

unnormalised: Ani mhaka dista, zodd tum ESPNcricinfo vo kitem-i sodhunk yeta exact numbers-ank pollyeunk. Mhoje yead tori ekdom perfect na, punn sadharan trend mhunnttlear India sadharanponnan crucial game-am-nt kam karta. Punn satyan, zodd ami jeetlear statsan vixim konn-ak kitem poddlelam asa, barem? Atanche match-ak vhorunk zai!
normalised: Anyways, tumi E-S-P-N cricinfo vo kiteim tankam choddeak zatki chok-chem shakta. Mhaka thoddich zaap yaad asa punn samany trend hem asa ki Bharat mukhel games-amni kaam chukta korta. Punn satya sangtak mhaka zoddhi statistics-anche vixim khuxhi na jittek lagun ashi, hai na? Pudhlen match aanunk di!
